EmailTemplate.name: Emily Team Takeover
EmailTemplate.subject: Graduate Takeover!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Looking to gain Event and Project Management skills... Would you like to gain experience to improve your CV this Easter? Interested in taking action to improve NCS this Summer?
We need exceptional young people interested in developing a Sponsorship event for the NCS programme in Solihull and Coventry. The aim of the event is to bring young people together and raise money for local charities.
You will be given a budget and support to plan the event as a team! We are looking for creative ideas!
Includes: Free advice session on writing your CV and Interview Skills.
Are you available on: Thursday 9th April (1-4pm) Thursday 16th April (1-4pm) Venue: City College Coventry, 50 Swanswell Street, Coventry, CV1 5DG.
To apply fill in the link below by Wednesday 1st April. We will let successful candidates know by Thursday 2nd April.
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/15wWO-spkwmTa-3jWIEbXRM3OBdJijA2M5PrSie2JfdA/viewform?usp=send_form
If you have any questions call or text Emily: 07557 747 549.
Thanks,
Emily
